properties.address: Joe Fagg Community Centre, Kent TN23 5RF
properties.description: A warm and friendly environment to come in out of the cold in the company of others, open to all, young families welcome. A variety of activities also available.
properties.title: Meet UP Warm UP

properties.description: Pneuma Church Compassion is open every weekday morning with a warm welcome for everyone. There's unlimited tea and coffee, always someone to talk to, and very often cake too! Come and find out about our other programmes including Renew for food, and Storehouse for children's clothing and equipment. Everyone is also welcome to Compassion Cafe on the last Saturday of each month 10am - 12noon, and Feast on the 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of each month 5 - 7pm.
properties.title: Pneuma Church Compassion

properties.description: Space has wheelchair accessibility and Accessible Toilets

hours._text: Variable opening hours. Just message our Facebook page or email us and we can let you know if we are there. Someone is usually there each day. We offer therapeutic arts and a friendly ear. We are inclusive, safe and warm.
